title: 5.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a presentation on crop production and management. Add several slides to introduce types of soil, and crops, the harmful causes that destroy crops and the climate suitable for various types of crops. Save the fi le with the name Crop Production. Check the accessibility of the fi le. Use Thesaurus and Spelling to modify the content.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
